Dr. Aris Thorn stood on the threshold, the weight of the moment pressing down on him. The archive was real. Every myth, every whispered legend from his years in the fringe archaeological circles, had led to this sterile, climate-controlled chamber. Rows of crystalline data drives glimmered under soft lights, and on a central pedestal rested a single, unadorned slate. This was the Legacy Vault, said to hold not history, but its precursor: the raw, unedited protocol of human genesis. He stepped inside, the door sealing behind him with a definitive *thunk*. The slate activated at his approach, its surface swirling with constellations of light. A calm, androgynous voice filled the room. "Custodian acknowledged. Biological and harmonic keys confirmed.
